name: Evofighters
body:
### EVOFighters
This is where fighting robots kill each other for survival, and learn to love along the way.

To run it:

```
$ pypy -m EvoFighters.Arena
Loaded an existing save file with 1000 creatures with 0 encounters under their belt                                     
 ________                ________  _         __       _                         
|_   __  |              |_   __  |(_)       [  |     / |_                      
  | |_ \_|_   __   .--.   | |_ \_|__   .--./)| |--. `| |-'.---.  _ .--.  .--.  
  |  _| _[ \ [  ]/ .'`\ \ |  _|  [  | / /'`\;| .-. | | | / /__\[ `/'`\]( (`\]
 _| |__/ |\ \/ / | \__. |_| |_    | | \ \._//| | | | | |,| \__., | |     `'.'. 
|________| \__/   '.__.'|_____|  [___].',__`[___]|__]\__/ '.__.'[___]   [\__) )
                                     ( ( __))

EvoFighters >>>> simulate
```

It's recommended that you run EVOFighters in pypy because evolution takes a lot of processing power (though it should work with CPython 2.7)
tagline: Genetic evolution of little fighting AI's
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
